Posts.Content: I noticed an orange peel look and a leathery feel to my breast up around my nipple area, so i took some pictures and sent them to my oncologist and sure enough she is recommending a biopsy.It has been over thre years since my first round with lady cancer and I'm curious if anyone has had the same happen and if so what was the outcome?
Posts.Title: possible recurrence?

Posts.Content: Thank You shelia, I'm going for a second opinion. I don't know if it is normal to do a biopsy without a breast exam> I don't feel any lumps, so I'm not sure what they can biopsy! Have to have faith and hope all is well with you.
Posts.Title: possible recurrence?
